content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. Let's discuss the price, shall we? How much were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 500 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept that price. It's far too low for the value of the apartment. I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality and location of the property. How about 800 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too high. I can offer 625 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 625 Euro is still not enough. The apartment is in the city center, close to all amenities, and newly built. I think a price of 775 Euro per month would be more fair. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we are too far apart in our initial offers.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your position, Yi-Nuo. However, I'm confident that we can find a price that meets both our expectations. If you're willing to come up to 775 Euro per month, I think we can agree on a lease. How about we take a short break and reconsider our positions?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 750 Euro per month is my final offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 750 Euro is still not enough. The apartment is in high demand due to its prime location and excellent condition. I'm looking for a tenant who values the quality and convenience of this property. How about we meet in the middle at 787.5 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [750] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept 750 Euro per month. The apartment is worth more than that. If you're not willing to come up to 787.5 Euro, I'm afraid we can't reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
